body.name: ISHARE 4K Digital Camera with WiFi, Autofocus, 3" Flip Screen, Wide-Angle & Macro Lens, 16X Digital Zoom, Flash, Vlogging for YouTube, 32GB Memory Card and 2pcs Batteries Included (Black)
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Friday, February 16. Order within 1 hr 22 mins
features: ✿【Ideal for Beginners】This digital camera is tailor-made for newcomers to photography. With a versatile 3-inch LCD screen that rotates 180°, you can effortlessly capture not only your surroundings but also perfect selfies. Experience the joy of easy and enjoyable selfie shooting. Plus, the built-in anti-shake function guarantees sharp and steady pictures. Explore various shooting modes, including time-lapse and slow-motion videos, to unleash your creativity.

✿【Share Your Memorable Moments Instantly】The WiFi-enabled digital camera allows you to snap photos and record videos using your smartphone. Simply download the "XDV PRO" App to remotely control the camcorder, instantly accessing your camera's photos. Share your unforgettable moments on social media with unprecedented ease. Additionally, you can use it as a webcam for video chats or live streaming by selecting the "Camera mode."

✿【16x Digital Zoom & Wide Angle Lens】With a remarkable 16x digital zoom, this vlogging camera lets you capture distant scenes effortlessly. The included wide-angle lens widens your perspective, making it perfect for shooting landscapes, portraits, or vlogs. It's your ticket to stunning outdoor photography.

✿【Clear Picture Quality】This 4K digital camera boasts 4K video resolution and an impressive 48MP capability. It delivers outstanding photography and recording results, ensuring you capture remarkable moments in high-definition quality. Relish in the beauty of natural and lifelike imagery.

❤【Perfect Gift& Great Service】 The vlogging camera is lightweight and easy to use. It is a best Birthday, Christmas, Thanksgiving Days Gift (The package includes a 32GB micro SD card). If any issue, we provide 12-month replacement and lifetime warranty.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Photo Resolution 48 MP, 30 MP, 24 MP,20 MP, 14 MP (Software interpolation) Video Resolution 4K 3840X2160 (30FPS), 2.7K 2688X1520 (30FPS), FHD 1920X1080(60FPS), FHD 1920X1080(30FPS) Image Sensor 13 Megapixel CMOS Sensor, maximum 48 Megapixels Zoom 16X Digital Zoom LCD Display 180° Rotation Flip 3.0" TFT LCD Storage Micro SD card up to 128GB / Class10(inclouded 32G Micro SD) Optical Zoom No WIFI Connection Support

How to Use Wi-Fi Connection: 1.Use the smart phone to scan the following QR code to download the app, or directly search XDV PRO in Google Play Store or Apple Store. 2.Press the menu button to turn on WiFi, the screen will display the WiFi name and password. 3.Open the settings on your phone or tablet. ------ WLAN, finds the camera WIFI ID, enters the WIFI password, and connects the phone with the camera. NOTE: Please connect to WiFi in the settings.

Warm Tips: 1. The camcorder is design for the Beginners, not for the Professional users. 2. Please format the Micro SD card before use the camcorder (in order to avoid system malfunction), the Micro SD card is ncluded in the package. 3. The vlogging camera doesn't support manual focus, the lens is fixed. Please keep a shooting distance at above 1.5m/4ft to take clear picture or video. 4. The digital camera zoom belong to the “Digital Zoom”, don't belong to the “optical zoom”. The vlogging camera is designed without “Auto Focus” feature and the camera didn't belong to the “Auto Focus”. 5. Please operate digital camera according to manual.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good camera for beginners!
reviews.reviewText: I like the fact that this camera is small and portable. I like the camera quality. I like that this camera comes with some lenses to start with. I do dislike that when you go to take a photo with flash it is literally like a flashlight not like actual camera flash. Overall I like this camera and I would recommend for a good beginner’s camera. I use this camera to learn and practice photography and to capture memories. I have taken it with me to different places and I like using this camera.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 26, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I love this camera - it’s the perfect camera for a beginner looking to begin their journey in photography.It is super easy to you, portable for on the go, and overall just everything that I was looking for.The quality of the photos has exceeded my expectations. I am very satisfied with my purchase and would recommend this camera to any beginner.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 30, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I absolutely love this! Such good quality for the price! Highly recommend!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 6, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This camera was absolute perfect in everyway. Got this camera for our family vacation and was blown away.Quality and durability of the camera was very impressive. It is the perfect size camera and fits nicely in a bag or even just carrying it. My kids even dropped it a few times and came back with no scratches, dents or any issues with the camera.The image quality is beyond impressive. All pictures taken were crisp, vivid images and came out beautifully. We captured some of the best pictures we have taken and was blown away by thr images.Highly recommend for any one looking for a top quality camera with great versatile.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Ishare digital camera
reviews.reviewText: I had bought my husband this camera for Christmas feeling like it was a pretty nice starter camera. When it arrived I took it out of the box and after playing around with it for a bit to see if it was the quality of camera I was looking for I was initially satisfied enough with the camera to wrap it up for my husbands gift. But then thinking about how I know my husband had mentioned when saying about wanting a camera like this that he would definitely want to be able to get some added accessories such as different lenses. So then I took a second look at the name of the brand to see what type of accessories you could buy for this camera and as far as I could see there was none of the type of accessories such as different size lenses that you could get for it. So I was honestly thinking about returning this one and upgrading it for one that I knew I would be able to get any added lenses or other accessories we might want for the camera. But I asked my husband what he thought and he said after looking at it himself that he was happy with this one, so now we have decided to keep it. But I will say I am disappointed that I was not able to find any of the add-ons that we would have wanted to get in the future.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great price. Easy to use. Just point and Shoot.
reviews.reviewText: I am a newbie when it comes to photography. I needed a camera that was easy to use and would provide great pictures. I need clear and high resolution pictures of my cakes and other baked goods for my site and magazine submissions.I tried several cameras, but none gives me the clarity and ease of use as the ISHARE 4K digital camera. It was as easy as Point and shoot.The ISHARE 4K Digital Camera offers a comprehensive package for vlogging. The WiFi connectivity, autofocus, and 16X digital zoom enhance versatility. The 3" flip screen is practical for vlog framing, and the wide-angle & macro lens provide creative options.The inclusion of a 32GB memory card and 2 batteries means extended shooting sessions and storage.Whether you are an amateur or a pro, you will find this camera suitable for all your photography needs.The only downside, I wish a tripod and external microphone were included.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 28, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Bought this as a gift for 13 year old daughter. Picture quality is great. Simple to use. Really good quality overall. Would purchase again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 29, 2023
reviews.reviewText: My cell phone fun the late 90s had a better camera
